newsitem.title: USA: Engineering Animation wins software pact.
newsitem.headline: Engineering Animation wins software pact.

text.p: Engineering Animation Inc said Thursday it received a contract from the University of Wisconsin-Madison to install its VisLab animation software at two of the school's departments.

The company said the software will be used by students and faculty at the college's Computer-Aided Engineering Center and Model Advanced Facility to create animations that help in the teaching and visualization of engineering concepts.
Financial terms of the agreement were not announced.
Engineering Animation is a software development company.
Its shares were off 3/8 Thursday at 23-1/4.
